monogatari r3

Monogatari

JavaScript game engine

This project aims to create an engine to facilitate game programming for browsers using the HTML canvas. Currently supporting 2D games.

Composed by JS libraries like three.js and box2d.js.

Demo

Zombies

A top-view zombie shooter.

  • URL - gemuzon.github.io/demo/zombies/
  • Source code - github.com/gemuzon/zombies
